ml.alternet.parser

Interface Grammar.Combine.Simplifiable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ComposedRule<List<Grammar.Rule>>, TraversableRule
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Grammar.Choice, Grammar.Sequence
    Enclosing class:
    Grammar.Combine

    public static interface Grammar.Combine.Simplifiable
extends ComposedRule<List<Grammar.Rule>>, TraversableRule
    For a rule that can be replaced by its component if it has just one, provided that it is not a grammar field.
    Author:
    Philippe Poulard
    See Also:
    TraversableRule.isGrammarField()

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface ml.alternet.parser.visit.TraversableRule

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Function<Grammar.Combine.Simplifiable,Optional<Grammar.Rule>> SIMPLIFY
      The default simplify method doesn't simplify named rules.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
